attributes.action: JOHN VENABLES NEW CRIMES SHOULD BE PUBLISHED ALONG WITH HIS NEW NAME AND NEW PRISON SENTANCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Venables should not be kept away from the publics view, he should be named under his new identity and we should have the right to know what new crimes he has commited.
Sarah's law has just come in all over the uk and that gives every parent the right to know if they have a offeneder within there family so John Venables should not be hidden for the crime's he has now done as well as the life he took of a 2 year old.
I could walk into any UK court and listen to a case, even if that person ends up with a not guilty, John Venables is guilty otherwise he would not of been recalled.

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
